WorkflowInfo.Name: Create Table from URL Parameters
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" x:Name="CustomWorkflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><MemorySet x:Name="storeURL" activityLicenseType="1" id="430" name="MemorySet" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Set Memory" Description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" VariableScope="Workflow" IsSaved="False" VariableName="url" VariableValue="http://www.mywebsite.com/post/new/?name=Derek&subject=This is my post&body=This is a sample post. Nothing really going on here.&status=published" IsAppend="False" TypeName="MemorySet" /><MatchRegularExpression x:Name="urlParametersExtracted" activityLicenseType="1" id="311" name="MatchRegularExpression" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Match Regular Expression" Description="Searches for all matches between a Regular Expression and a given text" MatchText="%url%" MatchFormula="([^\/]+$)" regexSelector="" formulaDescription="" formulaDisplay="" TypeName="MatchRegularExpression" /><ReplaceString x:Name="urlParameters" activityLicenseType="1" id="321" name="ReplaceString" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Replace Text" Description="Returns a new string in which all occurrences of a specified sub string are replaced with another sub string" ReplaceOriginalVariable="True" IsMatchCase="False" IsRegex="False" FindString="?" SourceString="%urlParametersExtracted%" ReplaceWithString="" RemoveSpaces="False" RemoveNewLines="False" RemoveTabs="False" TypeName="ReplaceString" /><ConvertTextToTable x:Name="urlParameterTable" activityLicenseType="1" id="317" name="ConvertTextToTable" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Convert Text to Table" Description="Converts a text variable into a table according to predefined column/row delimiters" TheValue="parameter=value&
%urlParameters%" ColumnsSelection="0" ColumnsDelimiterText="=" ColumnsDelimiter="=" ColumnsDelimiterSelection="=" ColumnsRowNumber="1" RowsSelection="0" RowsDelimiterText="&" RowsDelimiterSelection="&" RowsDelimiter="&" TypeName="ConvertTextToTable" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
